data.taskTitle: on /source use projectselector.svelte to select projects
on /source use projectselector.svelte to select projects
data.approach: Replace inline project selector dropdown in /source page with the reusable ProjectSelector.svelte component, and add sorting to show most recently used projects first (similar to ActionPill.svelte behavior)

data.taskTitle: on /source use projectselector.svelte to select projects
summary: Refactored /source page to use ProjectSelector component instead of inline dropdown
Refactored /files page to use same ProjectSelector component for consistency
Fixed animation delay values that were scrambled (causing wrong load order)
Added fast cascade animation (0.05s increments vs 0.15s for snappy feel)
Made dropdown full width and improved item spacing
Added projectColors prop for immediate color rendering without async delay
Added stats=true to /files API call for consistent sorting by recent activity

patterns: Use ProjectSelector component for any project dropdown - pass projectColors Map for immediate colors
Use fade-in-fast and fade-in-fast-delay-* classes for snappy dropdown animations
